landing.bio: I am a pre-final year student in Computer Science and Engineering Stream. I am a Front End developer.I use React,AngularJs for the frontend development.

experience.aboutWork: Worked on Soil Mechanics and Foundation Engineering Lab of Virtual Labs IIIT Hyderabad and added new features in it.

education.university: BVRIT College of Engineering for Women

interests.paragraphOne: I am currently interested in Data Science and Machine Learning.I have worked in Data Visualization field using python libraries.I am interested in Competitive Programming and working on various platforms like Codechef,HackerRank,Codeforces.
interests.paragraphTwo: Apart from Academics, I watch number of sci-fi genre movies and television shows, and I spend a large amount of my free time reading blogs and books.

awards.awardDetail: Scored  Distinction in Xobin Certified Python Bootcamp
Secured 8th position in Flipkart Grid Machine Learning Quiz in Campus.
